channel.description: Bliss of the Celibate [ Date Read: 2023-12-03 Rating 7/10 Sex drive is a powerful force. And misusing it brings you down to the level of an animal. You must conserve and transmute this force to reveal your true gifts. Feeding lust makes you never satisfied, and spills over into all other areas in life. Notes Thousand petalled Lotus is the highest form of consciousness. The ultimate law by god is to use sex only for procreation.
